attributes.name: description
attributes.content: Patrick Obermeier is a Senior React Developer from Vienna, Austria. Creating web apps and websites using latest technologies like React & the MERN-Stack with passion!
Patrick Obermeier is a Senior React Developer from Vienna, Austria. Creating web apps and websites using latest technologies like React & the MERN-Stack with passion!

attributes.name: twitter:description
attributes.content: Patrick Obermeier is a Senior React Developer from Vienna, Austria. Creating web apps and websites using latest technologies like React & the MERN-Stack with passion!

sections.heading: Creating fresh & fast web apps and sites with passion!
sections.subHeading: Senior Frontend Developer & Online-Marketing Expert from Vienna, Austria

dynamicContent.text:
I'm an experienced front-end developer with a solid background in everything related to online-marketing on top. It is my passion to build slick & well optimized websites and web apps.

Iâ€™m very much into gaming and learning to work with new technologies, always improving myself to stay on top of my field. Further, I like nature and enjoy doing some trekking from time to time. Finally, I'm a good person to have a beer with.

sections.heading: Featured Personal Projects
sections.description: Below you can find a selection of personal projects I've been working on recently. For these you can check out both the code and a live version of the project. If you're interested in my work you're welcome to check out the other public repositories [on my GitHub profile.](https://github.com/Pobermeier) Additionally, you can find an excerpt of my professional work [in the next section](#work-excerpts).

projects.title: Vintage Poker
projects.subTitle: Poker Platform
projects.description: Vintage Poker is a poker platform built with the MERN-stack and Socket.io. The "Styled Components"-library was used to build a UI with a custom look & feel. Localized content (DE & EN) is being managed & loaded from the Headless-CMS Contentful.

projects.title: DevMeetup
projects.subTitle: Social Network
projects.description: A social network for developers built with the MERN-stack. Backend-API is set-up with Node.js and Express including authentication using JWT web tokens. The app uses Redux for client-side state management.

projects.title: SimplySticky
projects.subTitle: Note-taking App
projects.description: SimplySticky is a full-CRUD Note-taking App build with React which is utilizing cloud functions to perform any of its backend functionality. Uses Netlify Identity as an external auth provider & Redux for internal state management.

projects.title: Battleship!
projects.subTitle: Multiplayer Game
projects.description: A multiplayer variant of the famous game "Battleship" implemented with Node.js, Express & Socket.io. Notable features are a game lobby to create & join games, in-game chat & 2-player multiplayer.

projects.title: Flashcards
projects.subTitle: Productivity App
projects.description: This is a productivity app created using React Native. Users can create virtual decks of flashcards, build a library of questions and answers for a specific topic and challenge themselves by taking quizzes and documenting their learning progress.

projects.title: Would you rather...?
projects.subTitle: Quiz App
projects.description: An implementation of the popular "Would you rather..."-game that uses React for the UI-part and Redux for state management. The "backend" is implemented as an in-client DB + fake API endpoints.

sections.heading: Professional Work Excerpts
sections.description: In this section you can find some excerpts from my day-to-day professional work. Please note that the source for these projects is private due to confidentiality.

projects.title: Social Casino Website
projects.subTitle: Marketing Website
projects.description: An example of a landing page for a reknown social casino brand. A PHP template engine and a headless CMS in the backend help to avoid code duplication and make marketing content editable by anybody. Combined with a focus on best-in-class loading speed optimizations this gives us a cutting edge over any competitor.

projects.title: ETRON Help Center
projects.subTitle: Documentation Website / Wiki
projects.description: This documentation website was build from scratch using the React-Framework Next.js. All the content required for the Wiki is being pulled from an external data source (Headless CMS) and all of the wiki pages and routes are dynamically generated using this data. Further, I integrated Algolia Docsearch to provide our users with a user-friendly full-text search experience.

projects.title: HamsterRat
projects.subTitle: Business Website
projects.description: I created this brochure website for my father who is running a consulting business. The main purpose of this site is to serve as a digital business card and FPOC for any potential clients. Optimizing keywords & other aspects related to SEO and optimizing loading speed were the most important considerations during the creation of this site.

sections.heading: Get In Touch
sections.description: Whether you are interested in hiring me, to work on a project together or to discuss any other proposal, feel free to contact me anytime. I am very much looking forward to your message!
